column1: This  is  an  application filed  by the  Petitioner seeking for  a

mandate 
in  the  nature  of  writ  of  Certiorari 
to  quash  the  1st

Respondent's  decision  contained 
in  P7(a)  which  directed 
the

petitioner  to  vacate  his  house  and  Land,  and  also 
to 
issue  a
mandate  in  the  nature  of writ  of prohibition  prohibiting  the  1 st

and 
the 
2n 
respondent 
from 
proceeding 
with 
action
